content: k1 k2tog k across n3 k to last 3 sts ssk k1 next round k all sts repeat these two rounds until you have 12 std on n1 and 6 std on n2 and n3 each move n3 sts onto n2 cut a long tail and graft toe using kitchener stitch weave ends repeat all instructions for second sock block and enjoy if you find errors please let me know
